message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I understand its value might be high to you, but I am only willing to pay up to $120 for it.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand you're willing to pay $120, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product for $130.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Given my budget constraints, I am unable to go above $120 for the product.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $125, which is the lowest price I'm willing to accept.
